Corporate+Business Intelligence+Performa.EXPLANATION: Percentage of KPIs that meet or exceed their performance targets.
Corporate+Business Intelligence+Performa.FORMULA: (Number of Achieved KPIs / Total Number of KPIs Set) * 100

Corporate+Business Intelligence+Performa.EXPLANATION: Accuracy of analyzing performance trends over time, based on how well predictions or forecasts align with actual results.
Corporate+Business Intelligence+Performa.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Performance Trends Identified / Total Number of Performance Trends) * 100

Corporate+Business Intelligence+Performa.KPIS: Departmental performance alignment with strategic goals.
Corporate+Business Intelligence+Performa.EXPLANATION: Degree to which departmental performance supports and aligns with the organizationâ€™s overall strategic goals.
Corporate+Business Intelligence+Performa.FORMULA: (Number of Aligned Goals / Total Number of Goals) * 100

Corporate+Business Intelligence+Performa.EXPLANATION: Average time required to complete performance evaluations for employees or teams from start to finish.
Corporate+Business Intelligence+Performa.FORMULA: Average Time from Performance Evaluation Start to Completion

Corporate+Business Intelligence+Performa.EXPLANATION: Score measuring the effectiveness of feedback provided to employees, based on clarity, usefulness, and impact on performance improvement.
Corporate+Business Intelligence+Performa.FORMULA: Average Score from Performance Feedback Surveys

Corporate+Business Intelligence+Performa.EXPLANATION: Percentage of performance improvement initiatives that achieve their intended outcomes or goals.
Corporate+Business Intelligence+Performa.FORMULA: (Number of Successful Improvement Initiatives / Total Number of Improvement Initiatives) * 100

Corporate+Business Intelligence+Performa.EXPLANATION: Comparison of performance metrics with those of industry peers to evaluate relative performance and identify best practices.
Corporate+Business Intelligence+Performa.FORMULA: (Performance Metric of Your Organization / Average Performance Metric of Industry Peers) * 100

Corporate+Business Intelligence+Performa.EXPLANATION: Percentage of scheduled performance reviews that are completed within the designated review period.
Corporate+Business Intelligence+Performa.FORMULA: (Number of Completed Performance Reviews / Total Number of Performance Reviews Scheduled) * 100
